comments:
Build 20031111+HEAD

I have a simple application that uses the generic workbench (but not the IDE).
When I launch it, it gets and NPE on startup and fails to launch.


The offending code is in WorkbenchActivityHelper and involves a 
WorkbenchPreferenceNode (id="org.eclipse.ui.preferencePages.Workbench") whose 
configurationElement is null.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.dialogs.WorkbenchPreferenceNode.getPluginId
(WorkbenchPreferenceNode.java:98)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchActivityHelper.createPreferenceMappings
(WorkbenchActivityHelper.java:236)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchActivityHelper.<init>
(WorkbenchActivityHelper.java:135)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchActivityHelper.getInstance
(WorkbenchActivityHelper.java:65)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.init(Workbench.java:857)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runUI(Workbench.java:1335)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.createAndRunWorkbench
(Workbench.java:235)
	at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createAndRunWorkbench(PlatformUI.java:139)
	at org.eclipse.ui.examples.application.ExampleApplication.run
(ExampleApplication.java:47)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:858)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:461)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:299)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:767)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:601)
